hit the wrong loadout drop and ended up on a missing page 📦
got caught in a crossfire between pages and ended up on a missing page 🔫
followed Captain Price into a secret mission and ended up on a missing page 🕵️
didn't use your UAV and got lost and ended up on a missing page 🛰️
tried to exfil without a chopper and ended up on a missing page 🚁
took the secret tunnel to Zombies and ended up on a missing page 🧟‍♂️
missed the Call... of Duty and ended up on a missing page 📞
tried to loot a non-existent cache and ended up on a missing page 💼
parachuted into an uncharted territory and ended up on a missing page 🗺️
mistakenly tried to rendezvous with Ghost and ended up on a missing page 👻
looked for Easter eggs in the wrong spot and ended up on a missing page 🥚

autosaving.title: Autosaving
autosaving.description: Your progress is automatically saved and stored. No account needed.

responsive.title: Responsive
responsive.description: The tracker works on all devices, from desktop to mobile.

export_import.title: Export/Import
export_import.description: Export your progress to a file and import it on another device.

filterable.title: Filterable
filterable.description: Easily switch between weapon categories and toggle completed on/off.

ad_free.title: Ad-free
ad_free.description: No annoying ads cluttering the site. Not now, not ever.

about.open_source_description: Built with {0}, hosted on {1} and analytics by {2}. The code to this site is available on {3}.
about.previous_trackers_description: Looking for camouflage trackers for the previous Call of Duty games going back to 2019?
about.subtitle: Keep track of your progress to the Dark Matter, Nebula and Abyss camouflages with this easy-to-use tracker.
about.support_me_description: You can support me by {0} 🍺, it'd be greatly appreciated!
about.title: Simple, lightweight & intuitive
about.tools_description: Looking for other useful tools created by some amazing people to help you complete your camouflages faster? You can find a list of them {0} on our tools page.

calling_cards.empty_search: Your search didn't match any Calling Cards 🤔
calling_cards.finished_placeholder: You have completed all Calling Card challenges 👏

completed_modal.body: Congratulations on finishing all mastery challenges! That's quite the feat! You first started tracking your grind here {duration} on {date}.
completed_modal.support: If you liked this tracker, show your appreciation by spreading the word about it and if you're feeling generous please consider {0} as a thanks. Hope I see you on the battlefield! Cheers! 🍺
completed_modal.title: Mastery challenges completed 👏🥳

mastery.info: Once you have unlocked each mastery camouflage, a mastery challenge is unlocked that requires you to get a certain amount of kills while using that specific camouflage to complete it.

progress.label: Mastery progress
progress.tooltip: Progress towards completing all mastery challenges

requirements.description: To unlock any of the mastery camouflages you need to unlock the previous camouflage stage. So for example, to unlock the Dark Matter camouflage the following requirements must be met: {checklist} As you progress through the camouflage stages you will unlock the next stage:

stage_requirements.military: Military camouflages requires you to incremently complete each challenge
stage_requirements.special: Once the Military camouflages has been unlocked, you unlock the Special camouflages challenges for that specific weapon.
stage_requirements.gold: Once the Special camouflages has been unlocked you unlock the Gold camouflage challenge for that specific weapon.
stage_requirements.diamond: After completing all Gold camouflage challenges for a specific category, you unlock the Diamond camouflage challenge for that specific weapon.
stage_requirements.dark_spine: Once you've unlocked the Diamond camouflage for all categories and weapons you then unlock the Dark Spine camouflage challenge for each weapon.
stage_requirements.dark_matter: And finally, after completing all previous camouflage challenges, the Dark Matter challenge is unlocked.

table.subtitle: To get to the next camouflage stage you need to first unlock the previous stage:
table.title: How do I unlock each camouflage stage?

requirements.title: How do I unlock the mastery camouflages?

export.description: Export your progress to another device, or browser.
export.title: Export progress

import.description: Import your progress from another device, or browser, by either pasting the exported code or uploading the exported file.
import.import_disabled_tooltip: You need to input code in the field above.
import.placeholder: Paste code here, or import from file below.
import.title: Import progress

confirm.body: Are you sure you want to reset all your progress?
confirm.title: Reset all progress

reset.description: This action will reset all your progress and start over from zero.
reset.title: Reset all progress
reset.warning: This action is irreversible if you haven't exported your progress.

weapon_completion.title: Weapon completion
weapon_completion.description: Choose which camouflage should be considered as completed for each weapon. This is useful if you want to track your progress towards a specific camouflage stage. For example, if you want to track your progress in stages towards the end goal, rather than just the final stage.
weapon_completion.label: Weapon completion stage

tools.title: Tools
tools.subtitle: Useful tools by some other amazing people to help you complete your camouflages faster.

multiplayer.double_click_category_tooltip: Double-click to toggle category as completed
multiplayer.finished_placeholder: You have completed all camouflage challenges 👏
multiplayer.info_tooltip: You only need to complete the number of base guns there are for each category to earn the Forged camouflage challenge. For example, the Assault Rifles requires a total of 6 Gilded camouflages to unlock the Forged camouflage challenge for all weapons in that category. Press this icon to read more.
multiplayer.info: You only need to complete the number of base guns there are for each category to earn the Forged camouflage challenge. For example, the Assault Rifles requires a total of 6 Gilded camouflages to unlock the Forged camouflage challenge for all weapons in that category. Read more {link}.

types.consecutive_kills_without_taking_damage: {amount} consecutive kills without taking damage {times} times
types.destructions_sm: {amount} enemy scorestreaks or vehicles destroyed in a single match {times} times
types.kills_sm: {amount} kills in a single match {times} times
types.kills_at_rare_rarity_or_higher: {amount} kills at Rare rarity or higher
types.kills_in_a_single_shot: {amount} kills in a single shot {times} times
types.kills_while_enforcer_combat_specialty_is: {amount} kills while Enforcer Combat Specialty is active
types.kills_while_recon_combat_speciality_is_a: {amount} kills while Recon Combat Specialty is active
types.kills_after_taking_damage: {amount} kills shortly after taking damage from them
types.kills_in_a_single_match: {amount} kills in a single match {times} times
types.kills_while_most_wanted: {amount} eliminations while being the Most Wanted Contract target
types.kills_while_recon_combat_specialty_is_ac: {amount} kills while Recon Combat Specialty is active
types.kills_while_strategist_combat_specialty_: {amount} kills while Strategist Combat Specialty is active
types.kills_while_under_uav: {amount} kills while under an enemy UAV
types.kills_while_impaired_by_tactical: {amount} kills while enemies impaired by your tacticals
types.kills_while_prone_within_20_seconds: {amount} kills while prone within 20 seconds {times} times
types.kills_with_4x_or_higher_magnification_sc: {amount} kills with a 4x or higher magnification scope
types.kills_without_releasing_trigger: {amount} kills without releasing the trigger {times} times
types.kills_on_affected_enemies_with_tacticals: {amount} kills on enemies affected by your Stun, Flashbang, or Shock Charge
types.kills_on_most_wanted_target: {amount} kills on a Most Wanted Contract target
types.one_kill_without_taking_damage: One kill without taking damage {times} times
types.scorestreaks_or_enemy_equipment_or_field: {amount} scorestreaks, enemy equipment, field upgrade destroyed {times} times
types.zombie_kills_while_affected_by_tactical: {amount} Zombie kills while they are affected by your Tactical
